gamingthelan.netutils
Class ObjectPacket

java.lang.Object
  gamingthelan.netutils.ObjectPacket
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPacket, java.io.Serializable
public class ObjectPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPacket

A general purpose concrete implementation of IPacket. This class will allow you to send a packet with a Java object attached to it. The attached object MUST implements Serializable interface.

Author:
Digitex Group
See Also:
Serialized Form
